devdoc.author: Lazarus
devdoc.details: This contract facilitates peer-to-peer payments using USDT (or any ERC20) while automatically splitting off platform and carbon offset fees. It inherits from Ownable for admin controls and ReentrancyGuard for security.

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

params.newCarbonOffsetFeePercent: The new carbon offset fee in basis points.
params.newPlatformFeePercent: The new platform fee in basis points.

params.amountSent: The net amount sent to the recipient.
params.carbonOffsetFee: The fee amount sent to the carbon offset wallet.
params.from: The user (msg.sender) who initiated the remittance.
params.platformFee: The fee amount sent to the platform wallet.
params.to: The final recipient of the funds.

params.newCarbonOffsetWallet: The new address for the carbon offset wallet.
params.newPlatformFeeWallet: The new address for the platform wallet.

params._carbonOffsetWallet: The address to receive carbon offset fees.
params._platformFeeWallet: The address to receive platform fees.
params._usdtTokenAddress: The address of the USDT (or equivalent) ERC20 token contract.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

sendRemittance(address,uint256).details: The caller (msg.sender) MUST have approved this contract to spend at least the (amount + fees) in USDT tokens *before* calling this function. The `_amount` parameter is the net value the recipient will receive. This function is protected against re-entrancy attacks.

params._amount: The net amount of USDT the recipient should receive.
params._recipient: The address of the final remittance recipient.

setFeePercentages(uint256,uint256).details: Only the owner can call this function.

params._newCarbonOffsetFeePercent: The new carbon offset fee in basis points.
params._newPlatformFeePercent: The new platform fee in basis points.

setFeeWallets(address,address).details: Only the owner can call this function.

params._newCarbonOffsetWallet: The new address for the carbon offset fee wallet.
params._newPlatformWallet: The new address for the platform fee wallet.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdrawTokens(address).details: Do NOT use this for the primary `usdtToken` unless in an emergency.

params._tokenAddress: The address of the ERC20 token to rescue.

devdoc.title: EcoRemit

FeesUpdated(uint256,uint256).notice: Emitted when fee percentages are updated by the owner.

RemittanceSent(address,address,uint256,u.notice: Emitted when a remittance is successfully processed and distributed.

WalletsUpdated(address,address).notice: Emitted when fee collection wallets are updated by the owner.

FEE_BASIS().notice: The denominator for all fee calculations (100.00%).

carbonOffsetFeePercent().notice: The carbon offset fee in basis points (e.g., 50 = 0.50%).

carbonOffsetWallet().notice: The wallet address that receives carbon offset fees.

constructor.notice: Initializes the contract with token and wallet addresses, and sets default fees.

platformFeePercent().notice: The platform fee in basis points (e.g., 100 = 1.00%).

platformFeeWallet().notice: The wallet address that receives platform fees.

sendRemittance(address,uint256).notice: Processes a remittance payment from a user (msg.sender) to a recipient.

setFeePercentages(uint256,uint256).notice: Updates the fee percentages for platform and carbon offsets.

setFeeWallets(address,address).notice: Updates the wallet addresses for fee collection.

usdtToken().notice: The ERC20 token contract used for remittances (e.g., USDT).

withdrawAVAX().notice: Allows the owner to withdraw any native AVAX (ETH) accidentally sent to this contract.

withdrawTokens(address).notice: Allows the owner to rescue any ERC20 tokens accidentally sent to this contract's address.

userdoc.notice: A secure and gas-efficient smart contract for processing sustainable remittances.
